title: Simón Bolívar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, you can attack someone, you can also attack another person if they are from Spain

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If you are in the game, everyone can speak Spanish without breaking the rules.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone with a role from Spain
